scripts.clean: npm run clean -w packages/typescript/types -w packages/typescript/session-backend -w packages/typescript/client -w packages/typescript/node -w packages/typescript/react -w packages/typescript/socketio
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/typescript/types -w packages/typescript/session-backend -w packages/typescript/client -w packages/typescript/node -w packages/typescript/react -w packages/typescript/socketio
scripts.format: npm run format -w packages/typescript/types -w packages/typescript/session-backend -w packages/typescript/client -w packages/typescript/node -w packages/typescript/react -w packages/typescript/socketio
